title: MultiThreadPlugins(MTP)
description: This multi-threaded plug-in is more used in c++, encapsulating the basic related multi-threaded functions, as well as its own multi-threaded pool, can be used differently according to different needs.
longDescription:
This multi-threaded plug-in is more used in c++, encapsulating the basic related multi-threaded functions, as well as its own multi-threaded pool, can be used differently according to different needs.

There is not too much implementation of the blueprint api interface, more is convenient for buyers to use in c++, you can easily and quickly create and use multithreading.

There are several blueprints for testing, and the underlying c++ blueprints are five pieces of binding code that show you how to use the plug-in.

If you want to use Blueprint's multi-threaded plugin, then I don't recommend buying it, it is more suitable for c++.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Support chain programming.
  •  the related create and bind as two thread plug-in patterns, in the form of templates in MTPManageBase.h
  •  Multiple management is combined in one management, only need to obtain management and create threads, and make their own upper-layer logic, do not need to consider the underlying business.
  • Iterations are few and encapsulation is easy to understand
  • Internal contains macros, macros can be used for multi-threaded use
  • Multiple ways to create threads, including prefacing tasks, blocking threads, and more
  • 代码中有中文注释，可供学习观看

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  •  MultiThreadPlugins

Number of Blueprints:2 sample blueprints, and a map

Number of C++ Classes:

19 c++ header files

8 c++ source files

Supported Development Platforms: Windows,Android[Packages for other platforms have not been tested]

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows,Android[Packages for other platforms have not been tested]

Documentation:https://blog.csdn.net/q244645787/article/details/132001284

Important/Additional Notes:If you want to use Blueprint's multi-threaded plugin, then I don't recommend buying it, it is more suitable for c++.
